amendment.description: Amendment to the Burton amendment (A033) limits funds from the Development Assistance Fund for India to not more than $65 million. The amendment subsequently failed with the rejection of the Burton amendment on Roll Call No. 446.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Burton amendment to limit funds from the Development Assistance Fund for India to not more than $65 million.

action.text: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Callahan to the Burton amendment (A033).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Callahan amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
